left_text: Body without yellow markings; scopal hairs minutely spiraled or zigzag; galeal comb absent; glossa longer than prementum (episternal groove weak, not reaching down to scrobal level)
right_text: Body with yellow at least on face and metasoma; scopal hairs simple (female unknown in Simpanurgus); galeal comb present; glossa shorter than prementum

left_text: Episternal groove well marked, extending below scrobal level; inner orbits of male convex, closest to one another medially (Iberian peninsula)
